channel.title: Pages on Desmond Choy's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Desmond Choy's Blog

item.title: About
item.description: I have been working in the investment industry since 2011, previously with a Fund of Hedge Funds, and subsequently with a regional life insurer. In my current capacity, I primarily perform fundamental bottoms-up research on corporate bonds and contribute to investment ideas in a regional asset management firm based in Singapore. Having discovered R in 2018, I very quickly fell in love with the language, packages and community - and have been using data science to augment and refine my investment process.
